title: Top court bans guns from Brazil's capital ahead of Lula inauguration
description: Brazil’s Supreme Court on Wednesday banned registered gun-owners from carrying firearms in the federal district until after the inauguration of President-elect

title: Chef José Andrés and his daughters go on a Spanish food tour in new TV show
description: On his new TV show, celebrated chef José Andrés goes into a restaurant kitchen in Spain and confronts a massive moray eel.

title: In Mexico, legal struggle to free women jailed for abortion continues
description: About 200 women are still in prison in Mexico under outdated anti-abortion state laws even though the Supreme Court decriminalized abortion last year, advocates said.

title: Rockets target Ukrainian civilians as Russia falters and Kyiv tries to shore up support
description: Fighting is intensifying in southern Ukraine — where officials said 33 Russian rockets were fired at civilian targets in the city of Kherson on Wednesday alone

title: New Netanyahu government makes West Bank settlement expansion top priority
description: Benjamin Netanyahu’s incoming hard-line government put West Bank settlement expansion at the top of its list of priorities on Wednesday.

title: 97-year-old former Nazi death camp secretary appeals conviction
description: A former secretary at the Nazi Stutthof concentration camp during World War II, appeals conviction of being an accessory to more than 10,000 murders.

title: U.S. considers new Covid rules for travelers from China amid surge in cases
description: Alarmed by China’s surge in Covid-19 cases, the Biden administration is considering new rules for travelers from the country, two U.S. officials said.

title: Pope Francis asks for prayers for ex pope Benedict, who he says is ‘very sick’
description: Pope Francis on  Wednesday asked for prayers for former pope Benedict, saying he is “very sick.” Francis made in a surprise appeal.

title: Novak Djokovic back in Australia a year after deportation
description: Novak Djokovic has arrived in Australia almost a year after he was deported over his stance against Covid-19 vaccination, Tennis Australia confirmed Wednesday.

title: Rohingya recount stories of hunger and desperation in escape to Indonesia
description: Rohingya Muslims who survived a harrowing 40 days on a boat across the Indian Ocean to end up in Indonesia have recounted stories of hunger and desperation.
